name: Ray's Abandoned Arboretum
description:
Ray is a queer trans teenager taking odd jobs while travelling around for her journal blog. When mr. poot (the cat) escapes during a house-sitting job,  she soon finds herself in a world hidden within an abandoned greenhouse.

Welcome to the itch page for my (school project) solo indie game! It's a point-n-click puzzle adventure! This is the demo of the tutorial scene, uploaded to get some feedback before I go on to the first real location (faerie forest). Please help support by playing this demo & leaving a comment about anything you would like to let me know!

I also have a google form https://forms.gle/r1ENXMVxCgGZ32gJ8; if you leave behind a social media handle I'll send you a doodle as a reward :)

ps. be warned that there is some swearing & a little bug that shows the circle of the travelled to locations.
